name: mcpassword-hasher
description: Password hashing with web extensions support.

scripts.build: npx webpack && cp src/*.html build/ && web-ext build -i testhtml
scripts.watch: mkdir build || cp src/*.html build/ && npx webpack -w
scripts.sign: zip src -r src && web-ext sign -i src -i src.zip -i testhtml --api-key=$API_KEY --api-secret=$API_SECRET -i mysign.sh

author: David McHealy
